class.rdfs:comment: Any feature associated or not with a medical condition. In medicine a symptom is generally subjective while a sign is objective.
class.rdfs:label: MedicalSignOrSymptom

schema:cause.rdfs:comment: Specifying a cause of something in general. e.g in medicine , one of the causative agent(s) that are most directly responsible for the pathophysiologic process that eventually results in the occurrence.
schema:cause.rdfs:label: cause

schema:possibleTreatment.rdfs:comment: A possible treatment to address this condition, sign or symptom.
schema:possibleTreatment.rdfs:label: possibleTreatment
